price: De Faraó. Por certo, ele era altivo, entre os que se entregavam a excessos.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
